name: LPMD_S_XML_DAEMONIZED_KILL_PROCESS_CHECK
summary: With default xml configuration, run lpmd with Daemonized options:intel_lpmd --loglevel=debug --dbus-enable; then enter auto low power mode and kill the process, change the xml configuration to set power setting to 0, and re-launch the lpmd with Daemonized options, at last kill the 2nd lpmd process and check journal log to see any error.
